Name: NAIRI: Rising Tide - Prologue
About the game: NAIRI: Rising Tide - Prologue is a free playable demo of NAIRI: Rising Tide , the second chapter in the exciting graphic adventure series NAIRI . In NAIRI: Rising Tide , Nairi continues on a perilous quest to save her family. As she and her companions try to overcome the many dangers of the corrupt city of Shirin, an apocalyptic prophecy threatens to devour everything... This free version contains around 20 minutes of gameplay and sets the scene for what will be an exciting second chapter! If you’ve not yet explored NAIRI: Tower of Shirin it’s available right now! /
